<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104986</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104986</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101496</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Strange Science: Alien Weather</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Merkwürdige Wissenschaft: Ausländisches 
Wetter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science Étrange : L'étranger 
Survivent à</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência Estranha: Tempo Estrangeiro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza Sconosciuta: Tempo Straniero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράξενη επιστήμη: Αλλοδαπός καιρός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia Extraña: Tiempo Extranjero</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Imagine what Earth would be like if we had to endure storms like those on neighboring planets</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seien Sie wie vor sich, stellen Sie, welche Masse 
wenn wir Stürme wie die auf benachbarten Planeten aushalten mußten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Imaginez que comme quelle terre soyez si nous 
devions supporter donne l'assaut à comme ceux sur les planètes 
voisines</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagine que terra seja como se nós tivermos que 
resistir tempestades como aqueles em planetas neighboring</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagini che terra sia come se dovessimo resistere
alle tempeste come quelli sui pianeti vicini</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φανταστείτε ποια γη θα ήταν όπως εάν έπρεπε να 
υπομείνουμε τις θύελλες όπως εκείνους στους γειτονικούς πλανήτες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imagínese como qué tierra sea si tuvimos que 
aguantar tormentas como ésos en los planetas vecinos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SCIVEE-TEAM
FN:SCIVEE-TEAM
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104986</entry>
    </identifier>
